Review.Titre: I have been buying voice minutes for…
Review.Contenu: I have been buying voice minutes for months and been very satisfied with them. At some point I discovered that my phone “memorized “ the pin so making phone calls is very easy. I would have given it the highest mark however the calls come through with names of different countries so the receivers don’t know who is calling and they ignore the calls. I had to send emails informing that if the see a country name on their phones it means I am calling.
